short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thanks for donating your Facebook Timeline. Help raise awareness of Alzheimer’s disease by donating your Facebook Timeline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By taking this action, you are supporting Alzheimer’s Disease Associations and the people they represent around the world. On Friday September 21, 2012, you will experience on Facebook how it feels to lose your memories, just for one day.

Worldwide 36 million people are living with Alzheimer's disease and dementia. Support Alzheimer’s Disease Associations this World Alzheimer's Day by donating your Facebook Timeline. Install this extension now and experience on Facebook how it feels to lose your memories, for one day, Friday September 21, 2012.

After downloading, spread the word on Facebook and Twitter by visiting http://www.alzheimersday2012.org
